Header: 'Suicide Prevention & Problem-Solving Psychological Programme' Goes to 11 Division
Content: Lecturers at the Army Directorate of Preventive Medicine and Mental Health at the Colombo Army Hospital, together with several civil counsellors delivered lectures on ‘Suicide Prevention and Problem-Solving Psychological Programme’ on Tuesday (2) at the 11 Division HQ auditorium  Kundasale at the request of the General Officer Commanding, 11 Division. 43 Officers and 335 Other Rankers from different establishments in the 11 Division attended the arrangement.
